name: Poo Zoo
description:
Use your mouse to click on the tiles you want zookeeper Emily Pooface to go to.

If the lion escapes, it will eat your visitors. Press the poo button in the top-right to drop poo in the lion's path to block them and send them back to their cage.

If visitors run into your poo they will be disgusted and you will lose money. You can clean the poo by going to the monkey cage and setting it free.

Emily Pooface will not walk over her own poo; that's gross.

If you're out of poo, go to the snack bar and eat snacks to replenish your poo.

Made for TOJam 11

Programming - Andrew Afan

Art - Emily Claire Afan.
